member.name: T:Goedel.Mesh.ConstraintsSelect
member.summary: Specifies constraints to be applied to a search result. These allow a client to limit the number of records returned, the quantity of data returned, the earliest and latest data returned, etc.

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.ConstraintsSelect.IndexMin
member.summary: Only return objects with an index value that is equal to or higher than the value specified.

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.ConstraintsSelect.IndexMax
member.summary: Only return objects with an index value that is equal to or lower than the value specified.

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.ConstraintsSelect.NotBefore
member.summary: Only data published on or after the specified time instant is requested.

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.ConstraintsSelect.Before
member.summary: Only data published before the specified time instant is requested. This excludes data published at the specified time instant.

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.ConstraintsSelect.PageKey
member.summary: Specifies a page key returned in a previous search operation in which the number of responses exceeded the specified bounds. When a page key is specified, all the other search parameters except for MaxEntries and MaxBytes are ignored and the service returns the next set of data responding to the earlier query.

member.summary: The holder has direct access to the cryptographic key required to perform the operation.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Degree.Service
member.summary: The cryptographic key required for the right are divided between the device and the Mesh service.

member.name: T:Goedel.Mesh.Resource
member.summary: Describes the resources to which access rights are granted.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Resource.Account
member.summary: Data right: Holder is able to Sign/Decrypt mesh messages under the account key.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Resource.Server
member.summary: Service right: Holder is credentialed to offer services under (name)

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Resource.CatalogCredential
member.summary: The credential catalog. Access limited to the service and administrative devices.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Resource.SpoolInbound
member.summary: The inbound spool. Read access is restricted to External devices. Write access is limited to the Mesh Service and to External devices posting completion messages.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Resource.SpoolOutbound
member.summary: The outbound spool. Read/write access is restricted to External devices.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Resource.SpoolLocal
member.summary: The local spool. Write access is limited to administration devices. Read access is limited to the specific device to which a message is directed.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Resource.SshClient
member.summary: Service right: Holder is credentialed as an SSH client.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Resource.SshService
member.summary: Service right: Holder is credentialed as an SSH service.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Resource.User
member.summary: Data right: Holder is able to Sign/Decrypt mesh messages under the account key.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Resource.GroupMember
member.summary: Ability to read data controlled under the group.

member.name: T:Goedel.Mesh.Access
member.summary: Access rights. These are principally Decrypt (read), Sign (write) and Authenticate (login) plus the ability grant these rights. Rights to a specific resource are limited to either data rights (read/write) or service rights (login).

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Access.Sign
member.summary: Sign (write) access, i.e. ability to sign updates to the catalog

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Right.Resource
member.summary: The type of resource to which access rights are granted.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Right.Degree
member.summary: The form of access (direct, service mediated, etc.)

member.param: The type of resource to which access rights are granted.
The access granted.
The form of access (direct, service mediated, etc.)
The named sub-resource (e.g. account).

member.name: T:Goedel.Mesh.Rights
member.summary: Class containing static identifiers describing rights.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsDevce
member.summary: Rights granted to every device connected to a Mesh. These are currently limited to the ability to read the network and application catalogs, both of which will require additional grants to be of use.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsService
member.summary: Rights granted to a named service device

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsMessage
member.summary: Rights granted to a device afforded external messaging capabilities in addition to those of a connected device. These add the right to read/update the contacts and publications catalogs, to read the inbound spool and read/write to the outbound spool and to sign and decrypt messages under the public credentials for the account.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsWeb
member.summary: Rights granted a device afforded Web access in addition to external messaging. These add the right to read/update the credential, calendar and bookmark catalogs.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsDeveloper
member.summary: Rights granted a device afforded Web access in addition to external messaging. These add the right to read/update the credential, calendar and bookmark catalogs.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsSSH
member.summary: Rights granted an SSH client device. This is limited to access to an SSH authenticator under the account. Which may be a device specific key plus a credential or the account key.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsPgp
member.summary: Rights granted to a PGP enabled device. This requires external messaging and the ability to sign/decrypt messages under the PGP keying.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsSmime
member.summary: Rights granted to an S/MIME enabled device. This requires external messaging and the ability to sign/decrypt messages under the S/MIME keying.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsGroupAdministrator
member.summary: Rights granted to a group administrator. An administrator can add users to the group but does not automatically gain the ability to access group materials themselves.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsGroupMember
member.summary: Rights granted to a group member. A group member can read/update the group publications catalog and decrypt data encrypted under the group key.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.RightsGrantThreashold
member.summary: Rights granted a device afforded Web access in addition to external messaging. These add the right to read/update the credential, calendar and bookmark catalogs.

member.name: F:Goedel.Mesh.Rights.DictionaryRights
member.summary: Dictionary mapping rights identifier to rights description.
